attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britsh born non domiciles do not pay tax in the UK e.g. wealthy individuals, sportsmen and women.

I ask the prime minister to introduce a patriot tax test which basically brings these individuals back into the UK tax net if they associate Symbols of British Patriotism with themselves, e.g the use of Knighthoods, Hoisting the British flag at sports events, the use of the National Anthem to demonstrate nationalism, the use of GBR as nationality.

HMRC should be able to use such a test to determine these individuals true tax status as does not seem fair that an individual can live tax free in a country and then claim to be British when it suits them.
